content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen and i seen how dark the clouds got in one area and though i would take a few photos of it to show my partner.  when i was taking the photos i could not see anything while taking the photos and took 2 photos back to back.

when i went to show my partner i noticed a black dot on the photo and thought it was a bit of dirt on my screen.  it wasnt.

i then zoomed into the object on my phone and noticed it was disc shaped in the middle with black fuzz and a brilliant halo around it.

when i took the next photo it was no more than 1-2 seconds after it the object was not there, i have no explanation for what it is and there was no planes in the area only birds and they where in close proximity of my house.
content.summary: Took photo of clouds, never seen it while taking photo but was in photo when i went to look at it.  never seen it when taking photo

content.detailedDescription:
I picked up a hitch hiker and was driving north to give him a ride. this site of what we saw was so intense i gave him a ride to his house up in maine and we talked about it the whole ride.
on my way back it was on the radio that this was reported from kansas across each state to maine. a clue for you is to check radio broadcasts around december 1981 to 1982 and you will see i am not lying or making it up. i was honored to see it and it was not a plane, jet or from here. it seemed like it was slowing down and the glow was from friction or the heat of the atmosphere and they were cooling it off by moving slow to take off into the sky. i wish i had my camera but a friend in pine bush new york years later used my camera and took hours of footage i have. i will send photos at your request.
content.summary: I was driving to maine on route 95 north with one person and we saw this blimp like glowing object humming sound and went west to east across the highway at a slow pace like 20 mph and kept straight and curved up slowly into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this for my partner. my partener and her sister had walked from her clients house to home. while passing the school they both stopped and started chatting to the janitor of the school when the sister noticed the object above the school, they all then looked in amazement. my partner immedietly recognises this as a space ship ufo. it seemed to hover or sail above school with lights flashing not very bright and for a few moments seemed to be supended, then within seconds it just dissapeared. excited and surprised my partner and the others there were baffled by what they had glimpsed. because all three people looked at each other to make sure they were not immagening it and thats when it dissapeared
content.summary: 3 people standing chatting witness hovering craft above a school

content.detailedDescription: On 17/12/12....12 o clock...Place-chennai , in india...I seen something different...One eye shaped bright object near the sun ....Object is same like as eye...Bright....At that time cloud is so clear....I m so exited because the object is much nearer the sun.
content.summary: Seen an object right side corner the sun. eye size and eye shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: Talking outside looked behind friends when object appeared instantly.  at first looked like fireball. stopped accessing started flashing and changed shape.  hovered then slowly faded.
content.summary: Ufo like object came into atmosphere. hovered changed shape disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were getting ready to watch the super moon come over the eastern horizon. i noticed two bright white lights coming for the east heading west. they were traveling at a high speed . i thought it was a plane banking toward the south coming right towards us. then all of a sudden the lights separated and one turned south and then disappeared .The other light turned to the north and disappeared. it was a clear evening and no other planes could be seen in the area.
content.summary: Two bright lights side by side . then separated and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my second yr of my engineering,studying in a college near rushikonda beach, vizag; india. i was a hosteler. there were regular power outages during those days at 7:00pm-9:00pm.  i was returning the hostel from library walking by the road beside our sports field. i saw two light separated by a constants distance moving very slowly over the rusikonda hill at about a mile high from the ground. i stood the and watched them for a few minutes they initial moved very slow, later passed the hill towards the beach adjacent to the hill and went towards the sea increased there altitude and disappeared in to the horizon.
content.summary: Two sperical balls of light seperated by a constant distance over a hill

content.detailedDescription: It was 13th of july. i along with my friend were sitting on the roof top of our house. fifa world cup finals were about to start at 12.30 am. we were simply chatting and killing time. it was a very cloudy night. the thick clouds were lightning, but not thundering. suddenly we spotted six flying objects some distance away. they were moving in a zig zag manner. it flew up, down and then suddenly changed direction and again flew back. they looked like dots. they were yellow and were pulsating red dots at times. i mistook them as aeroplanes, but aeroplanes can't move so fast. also they flew front and back with such ease and speed, that any witness can say that it hadn't a plane. i forgot about it. but last night i was watching hanger i, and found resemblance.
content.summary: Six flying objects on a cloudy night. clouds were lightning. they appeared and moved around zig zag. disappeared into clouds in a minute. faster than jets.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down towards 71st & quincy in tulsa, ok. from a little ways away i saw what i thought was a black balloon floating towards our direction. i watched it coming towards us as it did i decided to open up the sun roof to get a better look. what i saw was no balloon. it was two triangular shaped objects. one right behind the other a little to the side. one was black the other was blue. they were small like stars. on the underside it looked like a letter "t" shape and it was bright like lit up maybe? they went by following each other. that was around 635pm maybe 640.  it was broad daylight and the clouds were not hiding them. earlier in the day maybe around 540 on my way past that area i did see what i thought was a news helicopter in the same area just hovering. never saw a story on the news about it. did anyone else see this?
content.summary: Driving towards 71st and quincy observed what i thought was a black balloon. i started watching it as it came closer i opened my sun roof and overhead was not 1 but two triangular objects one behind the other slowly passing. underneath looked like a a "t"

content.detailedDescription: See attachment for a very detailed description.
content.summary: There was a large rectangular object passing over the house and then an abduction by a 6 foot tall entity wearing a uniform.

content.detailedDescription: Looking at the ring around the sun in the sky in my back yard ,took some pictures i never saw a ring around the sun like that.  didn't  see the object until i look at the pics. the sun was to bright to look at. wow! can you tell me what it is i have more pics. thanks
content.summary: Dark and looked big

content.detailedDescription: Two of us were walking on our property by the lake just before sunset, and noticed two very bright round lights (no tails) going across the sky from the south, over the horizon, and traveling very fast.  it was too fast for planes or satellites. there was no sound.  they looked like shooting stars but it was too light out to see any stars, and they were traveling together close to each other.  they went all the way across half of the sky so we had to turn to watch them and then they both disappeared at the same time.  it only lasted about a minute for it to go 180 degrees. two of us saw it and watched it carefully, as it was something we had never seen before.  we have seen shooting stars before, but this was different, larger, brighter, and it was too early to see stars out   we have seen satellites as well but this was much larger than the satellites we can see in the night sky, and they were moving so quickly, and then they both disappeared. we were shocked and said to each other, 'what was that'? we could not figure out what it could be.  we could come up with no explanation of what it was.
content.summary: Saw two lights in sky traveling too fast for a plane or satellite, went across horizon then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: July the 13  step out of my house for some fresh air.Notice d the western sky had aayellow hue.Turnd off lights on my deck.I saw 4 yellow orngane bright lights over the peek of my roof. it seemed like they came in waves. 3 waves app.30 sec. apart i yell for my mother to come out and see the lights.She came out we watch ed till 10:45pm.We think there where about 30 or 35                stephen riddle
content.summary: Wave of four ufo about 30 inall.

content.detailedDescription:
1.) we were not present.  ufo���������s were captured in a picture taken by a stationary wildlife camera, a bushnell trailscout pro, model 119935.
2.) the ufo's were found in a batch of pictures from the wildlife camera a day after the picture was taken.
3.) we have no idea what the object is.  it's just a strange object in the sky.
4.) it's a round object with an oddly textured surface. there's a ring just inside the perimeter making it look like a pie crust.  no action was seen, the picture appears to show the objects hovering.
5.) we are intrigued by the picture.  we simply wish to identify what these objects are.
6.) three pictures were captured within 30 minutes.  only the middle picture contains the objects.

on april 11th, 2014 the attached pictures were captured by a bushnell trailscout pro (crittercam) place near our driveway in julian, ca.  we put the crittercam out to see what animals are walking around the property at night.  we expected to catch coyotes or skunks or possibly a mountain lion.  we did not expect to catch the flying objects illustrated below.

the camera was on the ground near the entrance to our gravel driveway.  it was tilted slightly upward and oriented on a nnw bearing.

picure sunp0009.Jpg is a clean shot of the camera���������s frame at around noon.  use this picture to get the best perspective of objects appearing in night shots.
 
8:54 pm, something triggers a picture (not included here), but nothing meaningful can be found in the frame, even when the exposure is manipulated with adobe photoshop cs5. 

9:03 pm the ufo appears in picture sunp0005.Jpg.  it's in the sky, just below the power line.
 
sunp0005c.Jpg is the object enlarged to "actual pixels" with no other photo effects.
sunp0005c2.Jpg is zoomed in a little larger than the actual pixels.
sunp0005e.Jpg is the same picture of the ufo after ramping up the exposure with adobe photoshop.
notice two additional objects of similar shape and texture appear out of the darkness.

we've posted the pictures on a website where they can be viewed by the public, and we'd be happy to give the url to interested parties.
content.summary: Ufo's captured by stationary wildlife camera

content.detailedDescription: On the 4th of july, i was standing on a dock on lake palestine, smith county, texas. i was in mid-conversation, facing north, when i saw what i thought was a strange plane of some sort. i pointed it out to the other person who agreed that it was odd... we guessed maybe even a drone. the flight path was steady, moving in a straight line across the lake, over power lines. from my perspective it travelled from the ne to the nw. it was an orange, steady, bright, glowing, circular craft. it was travelling at the speed a conventional small aircraft would. if it weren't for the light source and shape, i would think it to be a private plane.
content.summary: Orange ball moves over lake

content.detailedDescription: Ex wife had just picked up my sons and was walking back to my apartment. got just in front of the apt when i noticed a bright blue glowing object at about 50-60 degrees above the horizon traveling incredibly fast. i would estimate it traveled from my position to the horizon in about 2 seconds. i was in naval aviation and have a pretty good grasp of what aircraft are capable of and this was traveling faster than anything i have ever seen. my stepdaughter also says she saw it but she is 7 and may just be parroting what i say i saw.
content.summary: Witnessed blue glowing object travel at high rate of speed in a n/ne direction. was moving incredibly fast.

content.detailedDescription: Darting around
content.summary: Saw darting lighys

content.detailedDescription: Our family was at the rose garden drive in theater in the 1970's to see swiss family robinson.I noticed a light in the sky above all the other normal city lights and alerted my wife to it. at first it was considerable distance from the theater but very visible in the sky.I pondered what it could possible be because i knew there were no towers or other structures that height in that part of the city.At first i chalked it off to the only other possibility-a chopper.But i could see no other red or green lights.Only white and it wasn't projecting any type of downward beam.It continued to approach the theater lot at a slow pace and i became really puzzled.Then it got really close and came in over the top of the big theater screen and literally stopped over the lot and just sat there.I had been in tons of choppers in nam and knew it wasn't that.It was round and emitted what i would equate to the soft white glow a frosted light bulb produces.Everybody was out of their respective vehicles and just staring up totally mesmerized.The craft made not an iota of sound and just sat there at what i would estimate to be at no more than 100-150 ft.Above the ground.I was in no way afraid just intrigued to the 10th power.After a minute or two it left.And when i say left-first it changed to red then to green (the whole ship) and then traveled due east over the city of tyler,tx. the only thing i can even remotely equate it's exit speed to is remembering the zillions of 50cal. traced rounds i have seen fired from machine guns in nam.I mean this craft went from where we were, in the extreme eastern part of tyler on hwy64,to the extreme western limits of tyler in an absolute nano-second.Just like the human eye can trace a tracer round as it travels down range at warp speed.Not only did everyone at the rose garden drive in see it but so did apparently many other folks from all over the city because kltv and the radio stations were jammed. and my old chemistry teacher at tjc, mrs. bsrgram got it on film. she and her hubby are amateur astronomers who built an elevated observation deck on to the back of their home complete with telescopes and special through the lens cameras.Right after this event i called her and she was still ecstatic saying she got many up close photos of the craft.She lives very near tjc which is, perhaps 1/2 mile from the old drive in.Somebody from some government agency wanted to see them and they were never returned.Her request to get them back were to no avail and she was livid.I have had other sightings at sea plus a fly over of six craft over our home at fairly low altitude but,this warm summer encounter was super close and one of a million million.
content.summary: Ufo overflew drive in theater at very low altitude

content.detailedDescription: It was roughly around 10:45pm.  i was dead tired from a long weekend.  i needed to water the garden.  i have some ham radio friends who sometimes like to talk late at night, so i grabbed my handheld radio, clipped it to my belt, and attached my earphones to it.  i went outside and noticing it was dark, i turned on the patio light in back.  i  first watered some potted plants and other plants in the flower beds (i chatted with a few people on the ham radio for the few minutes it took me to do this).  i then went to my side-yard, uncoiled the hose and attached the sprayer.  there was no activity on the ham radio by this time.  before i was going to water the garden, i was going to quickly spray an area of dry grass.  i started to do this, when my ham radio burst into static.  this sometimes occurs on the frequency i was tuned, but it is usually caused by weak signals from other hams, so i can usually hear a scratchy voice coming through under the static.  however, my radio was loud with nothing but static.  i turned off the sprayer and dropped it and the hose.  i unclipped the radio and checked to see if the squelch had somehow been turned off.  nope.  so i adjusted the squelch to the higher setting and my radio went silent.  i was about to clip the radio back to my belt, but my radio again became alive with white noise.  i checked the squelch again.  it was still at max.  i then moved to adjacent frequencies and the squelch wasn't working there either.  i then raised my radio high up into the air to see if the frequencies were more clear if the antenna was higher.  that's when i saw it.  a large triangular shaped object slightly to the east of me.   it couldn't have been more than a half mile away.   for the smallest fraction of a second, i thought it was a plane, but it didn't move, it just hovered.  the faint lights on it weren't flashing or blinking.  i was frozen.  i didn't know what it was.  could it be a drone? it floated, perfectly still for a moment longer, then it started to slowly glide away from me.  i don't recall hearing anything.  i noticed that some, perhaps all, of the lights on it were slowly and gently pulsating.  a second or two later, it very quickly moved in a northernly direction and was out of my line of sight in a matter of seconds.  i didn't move.  it couldn't have been a drone.  i tried to process what i saw, but couldn't.  a few moments later, voices emanating from my ham radio caught my attention.  i turned off the radio, put the hose away, went inside and sat on the edge of my bed.  i didn't know what i had seen and didn't know what to do about it.  i took a shower, brushed my teeth, and then sat at the dining table for several moments, trying to process what i had witnessed.  i didn't get much sleep that night, nor the night after.  this stupid thing has affected me, and i don't like it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw triangular object in sky, hovered, moved in one direction, then took off rapidly in another until i lost sight of it

content.detailedDescription: This incident took place about 15 years ago , as i was on a golf course in the kelowna area of british columbia. it was during the middle of the week during the summer, and as i can recall, it was very warm . i was all alone at the time , as it was a slow time of the week , so i was the only one on the golf course to see the object (to the best of my knowledge)... i was on a plateau where there were two tee-offs to two separate fairways , so i had a pretty good view of the surrounding area. as i was taking my practice swings , i happened to look northwards , across the valley, and noticed what appeared to be a hot air balloon,(but quite a bit larger than a typical hot air balloon), about half a mile away..Upon further inspection, i noticed that this object had no basket or undercarriage that a typical hot air balloon would have...It was silver , and was kind of shimmering , much like a metal ball bearing would if exposed to the sun... it didn't move or make any sound at all and just sat there, shimmering in the sun , about 250-300 feet above some houses in the subdivision across the valley...I had a very strange feeling as i was observing this object , kind of like someone was watching me....I watched this object for about 3-4 minutes , then decided to hit my ball... after i hit my ball , i looked up to the same area , where the houses were , and realized that the object had vanished, just disappeared without a trace...I just stood there in disbelief , with the realization that i certainly hadn't witnessed a hot air balloon ! unfortunately , i didn't have a camera or cell phone with me to take a photo , so was unable to have evidence to show, and i think this is why i've been reluctant to share this story publicly , although , over the years , it has made for some interesting story telling around the campfire !
content.summary: While golfing , i was standing on a plateau , and saw a large silver globe hovering above a local  subdivision , across the valley

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i was walking home from afternoon walk i was going home in the middle of the city.I was on the intersection when i noticed some guy filming a something with a pretty large camera so i have looked and i saw in distance something it looks like a something metallic first one second one was above the first he was black.When i saw them i tough't this is not right they r just standing on sky so i took my cell and take one photo just when i was trying to get camera i have look and they were no longer there i was calm i got home and upload picture on my pc then i start to playing with the lights in backraund in program picasa and i have got some for me atleest interesting images.I will send u an original photo not tempered in any way.I really hope .....U have better equipment that u will answer me what is on the photo maybe its helicopter but i didn't here nothing maybe its a ballon or something i just ask of u a reply to tell me what do u think or know it is. i i  have send u from the same photo of 2 on 400% zoom objects and what did i get on picasa and u can watch my video i have posted on youtube me playing with the lights in backraund and the title is new ufo daylight sighting over bosnia sarajevo .Just one more thing please respond send me anything whatever u find aut please i'm sorry about my bad english i hope that u will understand me
content.summary: I was going home from a walk trough the city when i saw a foren guy japanese or chineese filming something in the sky so i did the same thing then i saw something and i have take one photo
content.locationName: Sarajevo, Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling west on i64 between lexington and louisville.   the object was white like the clouds, at first i thought it was a kc135, then a private jet; however the object did not move.  i lost sight of it for i was driving.  about 15-20 minutes later i saw it out the side window.  same hight and still hovering. the second time i saw it i thought it was a ufo,  too big to be a droid, what was weird was that it wasn't moving.  the size did not change.  it appeared to be white or reflecting the clouds.  i drove out of the area.
content.summary: The object was hovering cloud high

content.detailedDescription:
35.918788, -116.26697 (roughly)

on vacation from out of state, traveling from los angeles to las vegas with a detour into death valley. driving at night, no other vehicles on the road. wife was asleep. radio started acting weird. i couldn't get a station in so i turned it off and rolled down the window. i slowed down looking out the side window and looked up at the stars. so much light pollution from where i'm from i was amazed at how much i could see. i continued glancing up at the sky from time to time and suddenly noticed there was no stars in a section of the sky. it was as i was pulling into a tunnel. so i slowed down and looked closer at the sky. 

i realized what i was looking at. possibly about 100 feet over the road and towards the shoulder was a pale black wing/wedge shape craft. i had slowed the car to near walking speed. there was no wind or clouds. the car i was driving was a hybrid and completely silent except for the tires slowly rotating. i could recognize the surface texture as well. 

i jumped up onto the window where my arm was and costed the car while trying to steer and not blink or make a noise. after a few minutes i realized how huge it was. i had costed for a few minutes underneath it and i was still less than half way down the side. 

the skin changed into a generic star pattern. slightly light stars and black sky. i was able to still clearly make out its outline. it looked like an optical illusion that would have fooled me had i not been looking directly at it and it changed. 

it dawned on me as soon as i saw it, that this could possibly be bad. it could be a government thing or something people don't want told so i kept my mouth shut. this is why i didn't involve my wife. when it changed its camo/skin i then decided it was time to get out of there. no pictures, no one knew it happened to me so there was no foul. i hit the gas and got out of there. oddly enough 10 minutes later my brakes overheated and failed while driving down into the valley. i had to use the e-brake to slow the car down. almost skid off the sheer drop on the side of the road. not sure if the 2 are related. i didn't connect the 2 then. i don't have mountains where i'm from. 

i waited until on the plane home before i told my wife and years before i said anything to anyone else. after some recent research i feel this would be a wise item to report. i'm a sceptic. i felt as though most of these reports were crazy people, mistaken identity and secret military projects. there is nothing i've seen that suggest it was man made with that tech or size.
content.summary: Dark wedge crossing road really lowly, clear skies

content.detailedDescription:
I was in tampa florida in feburary 2014.  it had been rainy and foggy weather sometimes rather hot and humid.

i only realized this object/craft after i looked at my pictures later.  it must have been quiet and moving fast, i guess because i didn't realize it.

i have seen other unsual metallic round objects in the skies mostly in frankln county, pennsyvania and one in everett, washington but this happened in florida duing a visit strange!
content.summary: I only realized this object/craft after i looked at my pictures later.  it must have been quiet and moving fast, i guess because i didn't realize it.

content.detailedDescription: One sighting was what looked like a big star i was in my driveway it was 3:43 am the end of june it was in the northeast sky and was traveling upward in a northeastern direction until it disappeard. another was  daytime and i have pictures two others were at night and i have pictures of one of them another was while i was at work it was shaped like a big pill /capsule and it seemed to be gold colored and about the size of a school bus and was flying like a backward slash \   also at work (which is what started all this) me and my friend at work saw orbs over the ocean which had smaller craft with flashing lights that flew into the orbs
content.summary: Had approx 5-6 sightings

content.detailedDescription:
About 11:15pm my wife calls me to come out on balcony. there just above sawgrass expressway a fairly large red glowing ball headed sw. no noise. never seen such a bright red almost like an energy glow. it appeared round maybe a little oval. a bright white light appeared to be in center or maybe through the center not sure as the glow was so intense. my wife said "is on fire" i said no but kept staring at it trying to figure out what the hell it could be. as it went past building i run downstairs to apartments courtyard and observe it til it dissapeared in the distance. lasted maybe 5 minutes. walk back into apartment and start telling wife what the heck was that. she interrupts me saying hurry up and look and sure enough like deja vu exactly same thing again. i wish i took photo from balcony but it happened so fast and unexpected. i start to run out again except she yells take your phone and take pics. of course i'm trying to zoom in with my new phone but couldn't figure it out. i start taking pics. if you look at pic close the object appears doing mostly white maybe from camera flash but the outline shows red. i zoomed in on pics on computer. a couple pics show the bright courtyard lights glaring at ground level i thought ruined the shot so i didn't zoom in on those pics until a couple days later. it you zoom in you see the red object maybe because flash didn't go off due to courtyard lights. it blew my mind to see the deep red. then i notice something else in top right corner i didn't notice when i was observing red object so intently. a bluish purple object shadowing the red object. what the heck could it be. there was no noise.
i'm ex usaf and seen all types of craft. never anything close to this. here's the kicker. i go back to apartment and of course right out on balcony to see if there are more. within 5 minutes an unmarked gray large helicopter races overhead directly west toward where the objects went. it was loud even after it was way beyond the area we first noticed the first one. we estimate the object was under clouds about 1000 ft above ground and 1000 ft away from us. since the sighting i've observed planes passing the area and the size was about the wingspan of a commercial plane so maybe 200'diameter. if this is govt its way beyond any technology we know or have been told of. i wish i videod it.
content.summary: Red glowing ball headed sw over everglades alongside sawgrass expressway by the bbt center lasted minutes until out of sight minutes later a 2nd one

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at the full moon out our front door i decided to take a picture of the moon to test out my new ipad mini, around 11:30 at night
i started to look around the moon, & noticed something strange by it, i started taking pictures and this object moved down then up like it knew i was taking pictures of it like it was posing for the camera, it was strange, i wasn't scared by the object just wonder why i am the only one who seen it in wink texas that had gotten pictures of this thing.
my husband and youngest daughter returned from the local store, he talked me into stepping back inside the house, but this isn't the 1st encounter i've had with a ufo.
i also wondered if it was the same object over me and my cousin over 10 yrs ago in a different part of texas when i was 17 i am 27 now
it probably doesn't help that wink texas isn't too far from roswell new mexico 
we see lots of military planes in our night skies, but no way shape or form this was military posing for my ipad mini camera that night in may around 11:30 something at night.
i still wonder why it was posing for my camera and what it may have wanted or needed help with.
content.summary: It moved like it knew i was taking it's picture

i started to look around the moon, & noticed something strange by it, i started taking pictures and this object moved down then up like it knew i was taking pictures of it like it was posing for the camera, it was strange, i wasn't scared by the object just wonder why i am the only one who seen it in wink texas that had gotten pictures of this thing.

content.detailedDescription: I could have thrown a rock at it, it was so close and low. a huge black triangle with white lights on each corner and a couple red blinking lights as well. then another smaller triangle came across the river. i was with my family having some fun time.It was stationary in the air for some time and then it vanished.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with windows and many lights

content.detailedDescription:
Description: while our games period was going on, we observed a very
peculiar shaped flying object. it was of black color with a shield of aura
around it.
it came into view from south west direction, hovered there for some time, then flew away towards north of north west direction and vanished.

it has a very different shape it looked to me like a cuboid kept over
4-6 hemisphere (*which was rotating) & had an aura (like some rainbow
splitting near it) it was rotating only while lifting up or down. it
came from south-west direction, & it seemed like it came downwards many of the spectators thought that to be balloon or anybody on parachute, but i had a small binocular with me when i peeped through it the flying object didn't look like any of the above mentioned.
then it hovered at that particular point for 8-10 seconds{at that instant it didn't rotate} then it flew upward towards north of north-west direction & vanished. it's speed should have been around 4-5000 km/hour (approx calculation by observing height, elevation & time, no device(s) involved, we were in school), may be over 10000 km/h when it started flying straight.

{unfortunately, as we all were in school no body of us had any camera or phone. so nobody had any pictures of it.}

date & time are as follows:
23 november 2012
time: between 04:30 pm & 5:15 pm (not exact time) (ist)
         {between 11:00 am & 11:45 am (not exact time) (gmt)}

* the time mentioned above is the time of the games period of our class, we didn't note the exact timing.


[when i returned home i searched about more ufo sightings in
bhubaneswar, khurda, odisha, india; but i found something on
kashmir(ind-china boarder) sightings where army personnel of both
countries have spotted many ufos, i am mentioning this findings
because the ufo i had seen moved towards nnw(north of north-west)
